commentList.translatedContent: In order to take the subway at Chaoyang Station, I found a nearby hotel. Except that it is not easy to find, everything else is very good. The sanitation and environment are very good. I would like to give you a suggestion. It is more expensive to book a room with breakfast online. It is more expensive to actually go to the hotel to add breakfast. 18 people. There is no subway station nearby and we can only take a taxi. It takes less than 5 minutes to take a taxi to the high-speed rail station. Overall, I am satisfied.
commentList.content: 為了坐朝陽站的地鐵，就近找一個酒店，除了不太好找，其它都很好，衞生，環境，都很好  給大家一個建議在網上訂帶早餐的房間比較貴，實際去酒店加早餐才18一位。附近沒有地鐵站衹能打車，去高鐵站打車不到5分鐘就到了。總的來説還是滿意的。

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，感謝您選擇漢庭!酒店在每位客人入住後都會進行房間清潔和消毒過的，讓每位客人都放心入住，酒店的早餐也是中西結合，自助形式的，酒店還增設了送物機器人，自助洗衣房，烘乾機，為您提供物超所值的便利!期待您再次光臨，祝您生活愉快!
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guests, thank you for choosing Hanting! The hotel will clean and disinfect the room after each guest checks in, so that every guest can stay at ease. The robot, self-service laundry room, and dryer provide you with value-for-money convenience! Look forward to your visit again and wish you a happy life!

commentList.translatedContent: Satisfied, it’s also convenient to go to the high-speed rail station!

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客您好，看到您對我們如此高的點評我們甚是欣慰，我們會持續保持，期待與您再次相遇，祝您生活愉快
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guests, we are very pleased to see that you have such high comments about us. We will continue to maintain it and look forward to meeting you again. I wish you a happy life.

commentList.translatedContent: The service attitude of the front desk and cleaning staff is very good! Breakfast for 18 people is economical and nutritious! Bottled water tastes good! The screen window in the triple room is not good, and the ventilation of the bottom-hung window is limited! The hotel provides disposable slippers, which cannot be worn in the shower. There are no slippers in the bathroom, and it is very cold to stand barefoot on the bathroom floor! The bathroom, toilet, and washroom are all separated into independent spaces, with dry and wet separation! No wardrobe, hangers too short! The indoor table is small and short, and some things can only be placed on the ground!
commentList.content: 前台和保潔人員服務態度都非常好！早餐18一位經濟營養！瓶裝水口感不錯！三人間紗窗不好、下懸窗通風有限！酒店提供一次性拖鞋，不能洗澡穿，浴室沒有拖鞋，光腳站在浴室地上很涼！浴室、衞生間、洗手間全部分隔成獨立空間，乾濕分離！沒有衣櫃，衣架太短！室內桌子小且短，有的東西衹能放地上！

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, hello, thank you for your stay and comments, we will make persistent efforts to provide you with high-quality services wholeheartedly, our small courtyard can park, and the surrounding transportation is convenient. It is less than two kilometers away from Beijing Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station, and the walking time is about 20 minutes. The hotel has set up a free laundry room, a food delivery robot, a free reading area and a tea area to provide value-for-money services for your travel.

commentList.translatedContent: The location is superior, the service is good, and the sanitation is good, but the side of the table needs to be wiped carefully. The room is the best in other chain hotels around. Don't ask me how I know, I have compared it. Robots are cute.
commentList.content: 地理位置優越，服務好，衞生較好，就是桌子側面需要注意擦一下，在周圍其他連鎖酒店裡房間是最好的，別問我怎麼知道，我去對比過。機器人很可愛。

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。

commentList.translatedContent: The room is very clean, the service at the front desk is very good, you can contact the front desk at any time, and we will answer all your questions! very satisfied
commentList.content: 房間衞生很乾凈，前台服務很好，隨時可以聯繫到前台，對於提問，有問必答！很滿意

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。

It is less than two kilometers away from Beijing Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station, and the walking time is about 20 minutes. , the hotel has set up a free laundry room, a food delivery robot, a free reading area and a tea area to provide value-for-money services for your travel.

commentList.translatedContent: The service is rated as 5 points. I couldn't get a taxi on a rainy day. Fortunately, the waitress was a Didi gold member, so she didn't delay the trip at all. Thank you beautiful lady 👍
commentList.content: 服務給5分好評。大雨天打不到車，幸虧服務員小姐姐是滴滴金牌會員，一點都不耽擱行程。感謝美麗的小姐姐👍

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。

commentList.translatedContent: The family room booked for a family trip, the room type information is exactly the same as the picture and description. The hotel service is warm and thoughtful, the location is convenient, the subway and high-speed rail station can be reached within walking distance, and the breakfast price is cheap and rich in variety
commentList.content: 家庭出遊定的家庭房，房型訊息與圖片，描述完全一致。酒店服務熱情周到，位置交通便利，地鐵高鐵站步行就可到達，早餐價格便宜種類豐富

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。

We can park in a small courtyard, and the surrounding transportation is convenient. It is less than two kilometers away from Beijing Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station, and it takes about 20 minutes to walk.

commentList.translatedContent: The room is good, it only takes a few minutes to take a taxi from the train station, the service is very good, and the breakfast is rich.
commentList.content: 房間不錯，離火車站打車衹需要幾分鐘，服務很好，早餐豐富。

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, hello, thank you for your stay and comments. We will make persistent efforts to provide you with high-quality services wholeheartedly. Our small courtyard can park and the surrounding transportation is convenient. It is less than two kilometers away from Beijing Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station, and the walking time is about 20 minutes. , the hotel has set up a free laundry room, a food delivery robot, a free reading area and a tea area to provide value-for-money services for your travel.

commentList.translatedContent:
The sanitation is very average. The surface of the table is just swept with a feather duster, and there are water and oil stains left by other guests before, and the window sill is smeared with black hands.
The most annoying thing is that I have to dry the washed clothes in the dryer. When I went downstairs, I saw two very unqualified middle-aged and elderly couples washing shoes in the washing machine and preparing to dry them. It was really disgusting. There are things like not letting underwear and shoes be washed. He also told me that he brushed it very clean, and it looked like it had just been taken out of the washing machine. After returning to the room, I called the front desk and told the front desk that someone was washing shoes in the washing machine and drying them in the dryer.
But she is still a skinny lady at the front desk who is on night shift, her attitude and service are very good.
commentList.content:
衞生很一般，桌子就是表面用雞毛撣子掃一下，還有之前其他客人留下的水漬油漬，窗台上一抹一手黑。
最生氣的是，要用烘乾機把洗好的衣服烘一下，下樓看見兩個很沒素質的中老年夫妻，用洗衣機洗鞋子，還準備要烘乾，真的很噁心，明明牆上貼有不讓洗內衣庫跟鞋子這類的東西。還跟我説自己刷的很乾凈，一看就是洗衣機裏剛拿出來的。後面回房間後打電話跟前台説有人在洗衣機裏洗鞋子還用烘乾機烘，前台説她不管，可笑那你還貼什麼提醒啊，你站洗衣機前面幫她洗多好啊。
但是還是個有瘦瘦的一個值夜班的前台小姐姐 態度 服務都很好。

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的貴賓，您好很抱歉給您這次入住帶來不好的體驗，在此由衷的對您説聲抱歉 您的意見我們已經內部員工加強了服務培訓及管理，期待您下次入住能看到我們的改變，期待您的下次光臨
feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, hello, I am sorry to bring you a bad experience during your stay. I would like to sincerely say sorry for your comments. We have strengthened service training and management for our internal staff. We look forward to your next stay. To our change, look forward to your next visit

commentList.translatedContent: The facilities are perfect, the sanitary conditions are good, quiet, and the service is very considerate. I stayed for four nights. There is a roast duck restaurant at the door. It is convenient to eat
commentList.content: 設施完善 衞生條件好 安靜 服務特別周到 住了四晚 門口就有個烤鴨店 吃的方便

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，您好，感謝您的入住與點評，我們將再接再厲，竭誠為您提供優質服務，我們小院能停車，周邊交通便利，距離北京朝陽高鐵站不足兩公里，步行時間大約20分鐘，酒店設定了免費洗衣房，送餐機器人，免費閲讀區和茶水區，為您的出行提供物超所值的服務。
